title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
Discover the magic of learning with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu! This innovative 3-in-1 kit includes Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link - AR-powered magnetic blocks that make math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving an engaging adventure for kids aged 4 to 10.

Boost your child's learning journey with interactive games (15 total), progressive education (pre-K to Grade 4), and 750+ levels of fun and challenge. With Plugo Count, they'll master counting and arithmetic skills. Plugo Letters will help them develop linguistic abilities and comprehension through spelling and vocabulary games. And with Plugo Link, problem-solving and fine-motor skills will blossom as they build and connect magnetic blocks.

Compatible with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, and Kindle Fire (specific models listed), this versatile STEM toy kit is perfect for both boys and girls. The 1 foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets, known as the gamepad, enhances the learning experience.

No need to worry about compatibility issues - just use the PlayShifu website compatibility dashboard to ensure your device is supported. Download the free Plugo app from the App Store or Google Play Store and let the adventure begin!

**Description:**

Discover the magic of learning with Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu! This 3-in-1 set, featuring Plugo Count, Letters, and Link kits, is an AR-powered educational solution that captivates young minds aged 4 to 10 years.

Join the adventure in math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving as your child engages with magnetic blocks like never before! With Plugo Count, they'll master counting and arithmetic skills; Plugo Letters helps develop linguistic abilities and comprehension through letter recognition and spelling games; and Plugo Link encourages problem-solving and fine-motor skills.

This STEM pack comes equipped with a foldable gamepad, enabling seamless interaction between your child's device and the magnetic blocks. The Plugo app, available for free on both App Store and Play Store, offers 15 interactive games and over 750 levels of progressive education, suitable for pre-K to Grade 4 students.

Compatible with iPads (iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above), Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire (selected models), and most Android devices running OS version 8 or higher, this versatile STEM toy fosters STEM skills in Math, Engineering, and Linguistic abilities.

Gift the wonder of learning to boys and girls today!

**Discover the Magical World of STEM Learning with Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu!**

Meet your child's new best friend, the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - a 3-in-1 AR-powered learning kit designed to ignite their curiosity in Math, Words, and Puzzles through magnetic blocks. Perfect for kids aged 4-10 years!

With Plugo Count, your child will embark on an adventure to develop essential counting skills and arithmetic concepts. Plugo Letters brings hours of fun as they learn spelling, vocabulary, and comprehension through interactive games. And with Plugo Link, problem-solving skills come to life as they build and connect magnetic blocks to create unique puzzles!

This gift includes 3 Plugo kits (Count, Letters, and Link) and a foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets to enhance their learning experience. The Plugo app is available for free on both App Store and Play Store, ensuring compatibility with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, and Kindle Fire!

Boost your child's learning journey as they progress through 750+ levels of education from pre-K to Grade 4. Develop fine-motor skills and enhance Math, Engineering, and Linguistic abilities with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu!

Compatibility is a breeze – simply check the PlayShifu website compatibility dashboard for your device model. Let's embark on this magical learning adventure together!

Discover the magic of learning with Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link! This innovative 3-in-1 STEM solution is designed for young learners aged 4 to 10 years old. With this AR-powered kit, your child will embark on an exciting journey of exploring math, spelling, vocabulary, and puzzle-solving through magnetic blocks.

The Plugo STEM Pack comes with three engaging kits: Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link. Each kit is packed with interactive games and educational content to develop essential skills such as counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills. Your child's learning journey will be filled with engaging activities that adapt to their progress from pre-K to Grade 4!

The Plugo STEM Pack includes a 1 foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets called the Gamepad. This gamepad makes the experience even more enjoyable by providing a stable surface for your child's tablet or phone while they play.

Compatible with iOS (iPhone 6 & above, iPad 5th Gen & above), Android (OS version 8 & above, 2GB RAM, front camera at the top center, not compatible with 10" screen tablets & above), and Amazon Fire (7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, 8+ - 2020), this versatile learning tool ensures that every child can join in on the fun.

The Plugo app, available for free download on both the App Store and Play Store, offers 15 interactive games with over 750 education levels to keep your child engaged and motivated. With no in-app purchases required, this is a worry-free learning experience for you and your family!

**Description:**

Discover the magic of learning with Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link, an interactive and engaging 3-in-1 STEM solution for children aged 4 to 10 years!

With this versatile set, young learners can explore Math through Plugo Count, expand their vocabulary and language skills with Plugo Letters, and engage their problem-solving abilities through Plugo Link. Each kit comes with magnetic blocks that bring the learning experience to life in an AR-powered environment!

The included 1 Plugo Gamepad transforms any tablet into a dynamic learning space, while the foldable mat and device slot make it convenient for both indoor and outdoor use.

Boost your child's education with:
- Interactive games (15) that cater to counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, and problem-solving skills
- 750+ levels of progressive education from pre-K to Grade 4
- Compatibility across iOS, Android devices, and Amazon Fire

Equip your child with the essential STEM skills for the future: Math, Engineering, and Linguistic abilities. Join the Plugo community today and let the learning adventure begin!

**Description:**

Meet the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link: A 3-in-1 AR-powered learning solution designed for kids aged 4-10. With this innovative STEM toy set, your child can explore the magical worlds of math, words, and puzzles through interactive games that develop counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills.

The Plugo Pack includes three captivating kits: Plugo Count for number recognition and arithmetic practice, Plugo Letters to boost vocabulary and spelling abilities, and Plugo Link for engaging puzzles that challenge your child's mind. Each kit comes with a set of magnetic blocks and a foldable mat with a device slot and embedded magnets - the Plugo Gamepad.

Compatible with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, and Kindle Fire devices, this versatile STEM toy is a must-have for boys and girls eager to learn in a fun and interactive way. With 15 interactive games and over 750 levels of progressive education ranging from pre-K to Grade 4, the Plugo App offers an adaptive learning experience that keeps your child engaged and motivated.

No device? No problem! The Plugo STEM Pack is also compatible with Amazon Fire tablets, making it a perfect gift for any occasion. Join the thousands of satisfied families who have transformed their children's learning journey using the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link. Experience the magic today!
